channel.title: Project runescape 3 team. post your support ;)
channel.description:
[s]Hello!
Me and some friends are gona start up a new community of developers called: [i]Runescape 3.[/i] Yea i know it sounds totally [i]stupid[/i]. But with help from[u] [b]you![/b][/u] we can accually make the best server. And it will be 2 best online game. We will start with smf community and upgrade to .com if this can get succsessfull. When you have oined (if you get ACCEPTED) you will get some information. But we need ideas to client and server + website.
We hope to see [b]YOU[/b] at the new community of developers.
[i]Forum administrator Age - Experience - Reason why you should be Mod - MSN -
Forum Maker/coder Age- Experience- MSN-
Global Moderator - Age - Experience - Reason why you should be GM - MSN -
Server Administrator - Age - Experience - Reason why you should be admin - MSN -
Server Moderator - Age - Experience - Reason why you should be Mod - MSN -
Server Coder- Age - Experience - MSN -
Client Coder- Age - Experience - MSN -
Bug viewer- Age- Experience- MSN-
Tester- Age- Experience- MSN-[/i]
[b] Server Coders: -P I M P 3 D Tut -yugioh101 - - -
Client Coders: -P I M P 3 D Tut - - - -
Global Mod: -Xx blitzy xX -Cyclone - - -
Forum admin: -xxbestxx -skullieskull -jm2k
Forum maker/coder:-jm2k -skullieskull -xxbestxx - -
Server admin: -yugioh101 -P I M P 3 D Tut - - -
Server mod: - - - - -
Tester: -christomax -xxbestxx - - -
Bug Viewer: -brazilhabb - - - -[/b] [ftp][/ftp][/s]
[size=15pt]I hope that when people are ready to work together It will start. Well no more hiring now, before the work starts!
MOD DO NOT MOVE[/size]

I don’t believe you.
Your signature says ‘34 members so far’.
You can’t call that a succesfull forum yet.
Even it is pretty pointless to put the amount of people in your signature because they keep coming if it’s a succesful community.
You know html? PHP? if your extremly good with smf and regular websites you should be great at it.
But you just have a SMFForFree site.
If you knew some coding you probarly had a host and uploaded smf yourself and installed it.
No way of being extremly good at it when you use smfforfree because you don’t know how to install it.[/quote]

yea i do i had a life before i came here dumbass i had a forum .com domain but let it run out…I do know html i wasint talking about this forum i do know html so dont say what you dont know ok?
